title: Twitter Introduces Gnip Insights APIs To Help Brands Better Understand Audiences And Content
description: Gnip is the company that has been keeping archives of every tweet going back to the first one in 2006. Twitter knew how important this data was to marketers and companies so it acquired the company and now has a fleet of APIs that it’s making bank on. Most recently it opened up instant access to all of those historical tweets. Today, during its developer conference Twitter Flight, the… Read More
